item.title: Statistical Tables with compareGroups
item.description: This is a quick example of how to create a manuscript table using compareGroups package Load packages pacman::p_load(tidyverse) pacman::p_load(compareGroups) Import data The sepsis data is a simulated clinical trial for 470 participants with two treatment groups. load(url("https://github.com/prise6/aVirtualTwins/blob/master/data/sepsis.rdata?raw=true")) Create table Default Table compareGroups(THERAPY ~ ., data = sepsis) %>% createTable() --------Summary descriptives table by 'THERAPY'--------- _______________________________________________ 0 1 p.overall N=153 N=317 ¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯ survival: 0.194 0 101 (66.0%) 188 (59.
